answers.answer: I'm sorry i'm 26 Weeks not 25 lol i'm on my phone and didn't notice till now lol
You might want to ask your doctor to check you for gestational diabetes. Keep monitoring your blood sugar levels until then.
I get the same way I'm hypoglycemic try a peice of candy an c if that helps even with normal it helps me

I have my glucose test scheduled for the 16th. I just don't know if I should move it up with how i've been running and feeling. And Dillonsmommy it's not low it's been running high that's what worry me.. So I think a piece of candy will only make a high sugar worst lol

question: I'm 25 Weeks and just haven't been feeling right. I have had hypoglycemia (my sugar can drop as low as 40s non pregnant) for years so I can test my sugar at home when I need to. With not feeling right i've tested it last night and today some. Last night it was running high 130s before I ate dinner  and this morning my fasting was 126. So I worry about this? I have my 1 hr gtt on the 16th but don't know of I should try to move it sooner. I just don't know if i'm over reacting lol. Do you girls think I should call the dr.?
title: should I worry?
